author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Rotary Club of Madras East, in association with the Corporation of Chennai, is conducting an elocution competition, ‘Wings to fly,’ exclusively for students across Corporation schools.

According to a press release, the preliminary of the competition for classes 6 to 9 and class 11 will be held on February 5 and the finals will be on February 25. The topics will be in both English and Tamil. Students can call Magesh Pattabhiraman on 98410 32035 or email wingstofly@rcme.in to register for the competition.
title: Elocution contest
